caption.title: Number of regions accurate within a target range by lead time.
caption.p: The number of regions where the Epicast point prediction was accurate within some range of the actual value is plotted as a function of lead time. Subplots show accuracy in (A; G) Peak Week, (B; H) Peak Height, and (C–F; I–L) wILI at 1, 2, 3, and 4 weeks ahead, respectively.
